string-array.name: data_name
string-array.item: Kiwi
Orange
Mango
Apple
Pear
Strawberry
Durian
Soursop
Lemon
Dragon Fruit

string-array.name: data_description
string-array.item: Kiwi is a small, green fruit with a fuzzy skin. It has a sweet and tart flavor and is a good source of vitamins C and K.
Orange is a citrus fruit with a bright orange color. It has a sweet and sour flavor and is a good source of vitamin C.
Mango is a tropical fruit with a yellow or orange skin. It has a sweet and creamy flavor and is a good source of vitamins A and C.
Apple is a round fruit with a red, green, or yellow skin. It has a sweet or tart flavor and is a good source of fiber.
Pear is a round fruit with a brown or green skin. It has a sweet or tart flavor and is a good source of fiber.
Strawberry is a small, red fruit with a sweet and tart flavor. It is a good source of vitamin C and fiber.
Durian is a large, spiky fruit with a strong, sweet and savory flavor. It is native to Southeast Asia and is a popular ingredient in Thai cuisine.
Soursop is a large, green fruit with a creamy, sour and sweet flavor. It is native to Central and South America and is a popular ingredient in Caribbean cuisine.
Lemon is a small, yellow fruit with a sour flavor. It is a good source of vitamin C and is used in a variety of dishes and drinks.
Dragon fruit, also known as pitaya, is a tropical fruit native to Mexico, Central America, and South America. It is a member of the cactus family and has a colorful, spiky exterior.
